phrs.translation: 村落, 峺协袈律, 已抄, 表演者
纽多普海滩, 新村滩

sentences.sentence: Come ten years recently, dorp area basically is twice grows severalfold even.
sentences.translation: 最近十几年来，村落面积基本上是成倍甚至几倍地增长。

sentences.sentence: See Europe from the plane, city and dorp set off one another in the ocean in green.
sentences.translation: 从飞机上看欧洲，城市和村落掩映在绿色的海洋中。

sentences.sentence: Although we are not happy with our Math a Regents Exam result, we will improve it next year and make New Dorp a better school.
sentences.translation: 虽然我们对州数学统考的结果不太满意，但是我们明年将改进它，把新道高中变为更好的学校。
